mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RESULT
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_CONDITION_ID = #{supplierConditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPERATING_TYPE = #{operatingType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CON_TYPE_ID = #{conTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_COUNT = #{statusCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REVIEW_TYPE = #{reviewType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RESULT set SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_CONDITION_ID = #{supplierConditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERATING_TYPE = #{operatingType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CON_TYPE_ID = #{conTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_COUNT = #{statusCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REVIEW_TYPE = #{reviewType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RESULT SET STATUS_COUNT = #{type} WHERE CON_TYPE_ID = #{conTypeId} AND OPERATING_TYPE = 0
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RESULT (SUPPLIER_ID,SUPPLIER_CONDITION_ID,PROJECT_ID,CON_TYPE_ID)
select #{item.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierConditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.conTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.select: SELECT wm_concat(t1.SUPPLIER_TYPE_ID) as SUPPLIER_TYPE_ID,t1.SUPPLIER_ID FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_TYPE_RELATE t1 INNER JOIN T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RESULT t2 ON t1.SUPPLIER_ID = T2.SUPPLIER_ID WHERE T2.SUPPLIER_CONDITION_ID =#{conditionId} GROUP BY t1.SUPPLIER_ID
SELECT SUPPLIER_ID supplierIds FROM T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RESULT WHERE RECORD_ID = #{value}
SELECT DISTINCT R.SUPPLIER_ID supplierIds FROM T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RESULT R LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RECORD E ON R.RECORD_ID = E.ID WHERE E.PROJECT_ID = #{value}

SELECT FROM T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RESULT R LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER S ON R.SUPPLIER_ID = S.ID WHERE R.RECORD_ID = #{recordId} AND R.SUPPLIER_TYPE = #{supplierType} AND R.JOIN IN (0,1) ORDER BY R.JOIN DESC
SELECT FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE R LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER S ON R.SUPPLIER_ID = S.ID WHERE R.RECORD_ID = #{recordId} AND R.OPERATING_TYPE IN (0,1) ORDER BY R.OPERATING_TYPE DESC
SELECT FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE R LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER S ON R.SUPPLIER_ID = S.ID WHERE R.RECORD_ID = #{recordId} AND R.OPERATING_TYPE IN (0,1) ORDER BY R.OPERATING_TYPE DESC
SELECT I.SUPPLIER_TYPE_RELATE_ID FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_ITEM I WHERE I.SUPPLIER_ID = #{value} GROUP BY I.SUPPLIER_TYPE_RELATE_ID

mapper.update:
update (select t.* from T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RESULT t left join t_ses_sms_supplier s on t.supplier_id = s.id where s.army_business_telephone = #{armyBuinessTelephone}) re
re.SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
re.CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
re.OPERATING_TYPE = #{operatingType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
re.IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
re.REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
re.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
re.UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
re.CON_TYPE_ID = #{conTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
re.STATUS_COUNT = #{statusCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
re.JOIN = #{join,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
re.REVIEW_TYPE = #{reviewType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where re.CONDITION_ID = #{conditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND re.RECORD_ID = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
